Description: Item ID (e.g. plant) as given in the OPS as plant_id
Unique ID for the component in the given item (as read in the OPF)
Functional group. Given by the Group field in the plant.yml file
Component type. Given by the Type names in the plant.yml files
Component light ray hits count per area unit
Barycentre of the component in X (~ X position of the component)
Barycentre of the component in Y (~ Y position of the component)
Barycentre of the component in Z (~ Z position of the component)
Fraction of the semi-hemisphere viewed by the component that is sky
Order 0 irradiance (intercepted light before scattering) for PAR
Order 0 energy (intercepted light before scattering) for PAR
Order n (including scattering) irradiance for PAR
